=======
History
=======

0.1.3 (2023-06-25)
------------------
- cleaner structure, more reliability
- pypi deployment
- sphynx docs
- removed bugs

0.1.3 (2023-03-11)
------------------

* bug fixes
* implementation of a new timeseries stationarity analysis
* yplus postprocessing
* additional tests


0.1.2 (2022-20-12)
------------------

* meshquality methods
* example data sets
* jupyter notebook examples
